title: Charming 3 Bedroom, 1.5 Bath in Lakeview, Available: 8/15/2022
posting_body: Comfortable three bedroom, one and a half bathroom in Lakeview features heat and water included, rehabbed kitchen with modern cabinets, stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, large combination living and dining rooms, ceiling fans, rehabbed bathrooms, large bedrooms, great closet space, hardwood floors, laundry in unit, and cats welcome!
Steps to the Lake, transportation, shopping, and nightlife!
Please Call Aleksandra Chadiev at 224/322-5494‬ to schedule an appointment to view this apartment and mention Apartment ID: 25400.
